title: When another 'nerf Ahri!' thread pops up

replies.body:
What I find odd about those threads is the fact that the last change she got that wasn't a bug fix was back in February. I've been playing since April and very rarely if ever saw a "nerf Ahri" thread. The only significant change was to the AP items. But even that wouldn't change much about her considering she usually builds:
{{item:3165}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3020}}

Her numbers and game play haven't been touched since 5.3 since they nerfed her after the 5.2 compensation buffs. She has received TWO BUG FIXES revolving around charms interaction with "unstoppable" forces and jungle monsters. Eleven patches later they want her nerfed. Ok.

It's very strange that she's suddenly a hot topic. Very few people complained about her until a couple of weeks ago, and I have no clue as to why. It could be that because she simply wasn't touched while maybe those around her were nerfed, bringing her to the forefront. other than that, beats me.
I mean the addition of Luden's was pretty recent, and that definitely increased her power.
DFG was removed around the same time, which greatly lowered her power (which is why they reworked her power budget a bit and added the MS boost to her Q).

heh, Ahri does not even hit that hard compared to other mages secondarily classified as assassins, heck even her full combo can't outright kill someone early on.  sure she has mobility from Orb of Deception and Spirit Rush and built in self healing from Essence Theft but that isn't at her disposal all the time. i have never been able to one shot people as her thanks to her fairly low scalings, unless they do not build any MR at all. and in all honesty considering the mobility and self heals, i do not mind the lack of ability to insta-gib people with only one or two items.

besides, i can name quite a few people that can ruin an Ahri's day *cough cough* Yasuo *cough cough* and if wanted to bash mobile mages i would take stabs at Kat or LeBlanc

She needs nerfs, the only reason she is not getting any is beacuse she is riot's golden eggs hen, all wannabe otaku girls make cosplay of her and riot is continuosly realasing Ahri skins, that's  why is is kept op, even though she is stupidly easy to use and is broken as fuck.
If you don't suck, it's not that hard to beat Ahri. Also, you do know that she has advantageous and disadvantageous matchups, right?
